question: Analyze the social media engagement of top companies in the technology sector for the last year.

subtasks.task: Identify top companies in the technology sector based on their revenue and market capitalization.
Gather social media engagement metrics (likes, comments, shares) from Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and YouTube for these companies over the last year.
Summarize the engagement data by company and determine the total engagement across platforms.
Compare social media engagement across different companies to highlight trends and insights in the technology sector.
